title: Western Comfort Level
100% Maasai Experience
text: Visit our luxurious accommodation surrounded by the beauty of nature and wildlife.
Owned and operated by Maasai, your stay benefits struggling local families directly.

title: Personalized Adventures
text: Embark on epic safaris and get immersed in local culture.
Witness the real Maasai life and culture beyond the veil of tourism.
The people you meet and the memories that you make will last a lifetime.

title: Healthy Meals
text: Taste original Kenyan foods like Ugali, Nyama Choma or Githeri.
Fill your stomach with our delicious burgers and fries or pizzas.
We will pack you a king's lunch for your trips so you will never get hungry like our children.
